name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The latest news about the famous blogger "Programming Random Thoughts" @programthink, who has disappeared for nearly two years since 2021, is circulating online. The screenshot of his wife calling for help on the Internet recently.
The picture shows that "Programming Random Thoughts" is actually named Ruan Xiaohuan, the chief engineer of the information security system of the 2008 Beijing Olympics. He was taken away by the police on May 10, 2021 and publicly sentenced on February 10, 2023. His wife was under pressure during the appeal.
On March 21, according to the news from Free Asia reporter Su Yutong @Suyutong, Ruan Xiaohuan was sentenced to 7 years in prison on February 10, 2023 for inciting subversion of the state, and was fined and deprived of rights for 2 years.

According to public information, "Programming Random Thoughts" was launched on January 15, 2009. The author claims to be a programmer who has worked for many years. At the beginning, he mainly wrote articles related to computer technology, and then began to join in circumventing the firewall and anonymous teaching. There are also criticisms of the Chinese Communist Party and the Chinese government and discussions on current political affairs.
His blog has been in existence for more than ten years, and its content on network security and political commentary has had a profound impact on the Chinese Internet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On March 22, in Songming County, Yunnan, a seven-year-old girl threw a four-year-old boy from the same village into a well, and then left calmly.
The two were neighbors from the same village. The boy was found and rescued shortly after the incident, and the girl's family compensated the boy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
